query: M是△ABC的边BC的中点,AN是△ABC的外角平分线,BN⊥AN于点N,且AB=4,MN=2.8,则AC的长是()选项：['1.2', '1.4', '1.6', '1.8']
answer: 【解答】解:延长CA、BN交于点D,在△ANB和△AND中,≥ft\{\begin{array}{l}{∠{BAN}=∠{DAN}}\\{{AN}={AN}}\\{∠{ANB}=∠{AND}}\end{array}\right.\end{array}\right.,∴△ANB≌△AND(ASA)∴AD=AB=4,BN=ND,∵BN=ND,BM=MC,∴CD=2MN=5.6,则AC=CD-AD=1.6,
